headline: Palo Alto Networks: Platformization Strategy Is Insufficient To Justify Huge Valuation Multiples (Downgrade)
summary: Palo Alto Networks trades at an unjustifiably lofty premium to other large-cap enterprise software peers. Read more about PANW stock here.
